name: Short Creepy Tales: 7PM
summary: Play through the day’s experience as each of three children living there and their attempts to invite a young mysterious new neighbor to play with them. However what was supposed to be an offer of friendship quickly takes a dark turn as each of the children experience horrific visitations. Further so, not everyone or everything is as it seems in this apartment block, and dark secrets lurk everywhere if you can see them.
